roles.title: Store Manager
responsibilities: Managed daily operations of high-volume store with 15,000+ active members
Supervised team of 12 employees across multiple shifts
Increased Game Pass subscriptions by 35% through targeted promotions
Reduced late fee disputes by implementing customer education program
Maintained inventory of 8,000+ VHS and DVD titles

roles.title: Assistant Manager
responsibilities: Coordinated new release wall organization every Tuesday
Trained staff on upselling techniques for candy and popcorn
Managed cash drawer reconciliation and nightly deposits
Handled customer account issues and waived late fees when appropriate

roles.title: Senior Customer Service Representative
responsibilities: Processed rental transactions and membership sign-ups
Rewound and inspected returned VHS tapes for damage
Provided movie recommendations based on customer preferences
Enforced rental policies and collected late fees

roles.title: Customer Service Representative
responsibilities: Greeted customers and processed rental returns
Re-shelved returned movies in correct genre sections
Operated VHS rewinding machines during closing shifts
Answered phone inquiries about movie availability
Cleaned and organized store during slow periods
